857380.name: CopperCube 6 Professional Edition
857380.description: Upgrades CopperCube 6 game engine to the Professional Edition: Adds the possibility to use post effects like Bloom, Blur, Vignette and similar, video playback, and also enables the possibility to customize the splash screen logo. Also, it adds a command line interface. For details of all these features, refer to the CopperCube documentation.
857380.supported_languages: 英语, 德语, 法语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 阿拉伯语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 俄语, 简体中文, 瑞典语, 土耳其语
